channel.title: Ergonomics of patching
channel.description:
Just got my axoloti today, I hope I'm missing something: 1) To insert a new object I have to click in menu Edit->New object (no keyboard shortcut). 2) Then I have to double-click the object I want to insert, which closes the new-object-selection window.
Would be nice with 1) Keyboard shortcut to open new-object-selection window 2) A way to keep the new-object-window open
This seems quite cumbersome, for inserting a new object.
NB: Runing latest from git on linux...
Edit: just found double-clicking for bringing up the window, much better...
